text: I am currently 9 months pregnant and have been hooked on this stuff for the past two months (since I heard about it).  It is extremely thirst quenching, and has a great dark chocolate flavor.  It's also nice to know that it's very healthy for me to get my chocolate fix!  LOVE IT!  I just wish it wasn't so expensive, but the best price I'm finding is on Amazon compared to local stores around me.
